Officers Info Page

This page is not a page of rules but of guidelines we hope you all follow. To insure ease of your duties, less hassle and fun play. If you have any ideas please leave them in the forum, thank you *smiles*

1. Each officer is allowed to recruite 5 members per week. This is so that the Webmistress, also the guild leader, can keep up with the new member's and add them to the page.

2. One of your duties is to censer the guildsay. We are honorable and should keep guild chat honorable at all times.As well as behavior outside of guild say. Handle this with honor and respect please, as they are friends and family as well as members.

3. Upon Recruiting a new member please give the following info to Elandria asap. Name, Class and Race (surname if they have one)

4. We hope that you follow a certain code, as all others look up to you. Being an officer is hard work and one that most respect. Be an example to all others in the guild please.
